title: Commandeft
description: A powerful CLI wrapper for Large Language Model interactions. Provides seamless integration with various LLM providers, conversation history management, and customizable prompts for enhanced developer productivity.

title: JobRunr Carbon-Aware Scheduling
description: Open-source contribution to JobRunr implementing carbon-aware job scheduling. Enables applications to schedule background jobs during periods of low carbon intensity, promoting sustainable computing practices.

title: Belgrade Smart City - Air Quality Forecasting
description: Machine learning-based air quality prediction system for Belgrade city. Uses historical data and meteorological features to forecast pollution levels, enabling proactive public health measures.

title: IIoT Distributed Data Processing
description: Master's thesis project implementing distributed data processing for Industrial IoT. Features edge computing, real-time analytics, and scalable architecture for handling high-velocity sensor data streams.

title: Self-Healing ETL Library
description: Internal library for building robust ETL pipelines with automatic error recovery, retry mechanisms, and comprehensive monitoring. Reduces pipeline failures and maintenance overhead significantly.

title: Water Management Platform
description: Real-time water infrastructure monitoring system with anomaly detection and alerting. Processes sensor data from distributed water network to detect leaks and optimize resource usage.
